   Trains a classification ruleset based on given data

   .. py:attribute:: cache

   .. py:method:: induce_ruleset(X: pandas.DataFrame, y: pandas.Series) -> decision_rules.regression.RegressionRuleSet

      Induces a regression ruleset based on given data

      Args:
          X (pd.DataFrame): data
          y (pd.Series): labels

      Returns:
          RegressionRuleSet: ruleset



   .. py:method:: _grow(rule: decision_rules.regression.RegressionRule, X_df: pandas.DataFrame, X: numpy.ndarray, y: numpy.ndarray, uncovered: set[int]) -> tuple[decision_rules.regression.RegressionRule, bool]

   .. py:method:: _find_best_candidate_for_conjunction(rule: decision_rules.regression.RegressionRule, cov: decision_rules.core.coverage.Coverage, conjunction: decision_rules.conditions.CompoundCondition, X_df: pandas.DataFrame, X: numpy.ndarray, y: numpy.ndarray, uncovered: set[int], rules_pn_sum: set[int]) -> tuple[decision_rules.core.condition.AbstractCondition, float]


   .. py:method:: _check_candidate(new_covered_examples: int, covered_count: int, uncovered: set[int]) -> bool
